#NXP LPC17xxSampleSoftware

= Introduction =

NXP LPC17xxSampleSoftware ported to GCC.
The orignal code can be downloaded from NXP support page here:

[http://www.standardics.nxp.com/support/documents/microcontrollers/zip/code.bundle.lpc17xx.keil.zip Sample Code Bundle for LPC17xx Peripherals using Keil's MDK-ARM, V1.0 (Jun 24, 2009)]

= Status =
2009.05.25  ver 1.00    Prelimnary version, first Release
